articles.title: Obesity might affect how well a coronavirus vaccine works - Atlanta Journal Constitution
articles.description: Studies have shown that flu, hepatitis B, tetanus and rabies vaccines can be less effective in obese adults than in the general population, and there’s no reason to believe a coronavirus vaccine will be any different.
